definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Qinhuangdao prefecture level city in Hebei
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
island nation (sometimes refers specifically to Japan)

sentences.english: A bowl-shaped desert island inhabited by a variety of monsters.
sentences.chinese: 狹長的沙漠島，息居着各種各樣的怪獸。

sentences.english: A town on the northern coast of the Isle of Wight off southern England.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭南部威特島北岸的一個城鎮。

sentences.english: I have been staying in Boracay for 3 months.
sentences.chinese: 我在長灘島已經生活了3個月了。

sentences.english: Irregular in shape, it is the largest of the Moluccas.
sentences.chinese: 它形狀不規則，是摩鹿加羣島中最大的一個島。

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛島菲律賓中西部一島嶼，位於呂宋島以南。

sentences.english: The general swore to take back this island whatever the cost.
sentences.chinese: 我位將軍發誓不惜任何代價奪回這個島。

sentences.english: In 1814, Malta became a part of the British Empire.
sentences.chinese: 1814年，馬耳他島淪爲大英帝國的殖民地。

sentences.english: On April 1, Thornburgh accompanied President Jimmy Carter on a tour of Three Mile Island.
sentences.chinese: 4月1日，索恩伯勒陪同總統吉米卡特視察了三裏島。

sentences.english: Thee island lies south by east from here.
sentences.chinese: 那個島位於此地的正南偏東方向。

sentences.english: For decades, the island was completely off-limits.
sentences.chinese: 數十年來，這個島一直都是禁區。

sentences.english: In 1974 , Niue becomes independent from New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 1974年的今天，紐埃島脫離新西蘭獨立。

sentences.english: Brunei Darussalam located in the northern part of Kalimantan Island.
sentences.chinese: 文萊達魯薩蘭國位於加里曼丹島北部。

sentences.english: Most of these were acquired under the delightfully Guano Island Act. when the U.
sentences.chinese: 大多數島嶼都是由於“鳥糞島法案”而獲得的。

sentences.english: Nick Rennie was born on the pacific island of Bougainville in 1974.
sentences.chinese: 尼克1974年出生於太平洋島布干維爾島。

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹島附近海域，大白鯊常會從水中衝出獵殺海狗。

sentences.english: In the afternoon of the same day, Hu Jintao left Gran Canaria Island for Beijing by special plane.
sentences.chinese: 當天下午，胡錦濤乘專機離開大加那利島返回北京。

definition: East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
